Name: James Lenhart
Comment: Is this possible right now using firebase?

Name: Aleksandr Pasevin
Comment: This is the only thing which I miss in webflow. Though I think this functionality would make their CMS obsolete in some cases because you would be able to use your own (e.x. Django) CMS instead.

Name: Steve Schacht
Comment: Yeah it would be really cool if WF had a built-in way to access external REST API's and retrieve data in a manner similar to the built-in DB - i.e. the external data source would just be a type of "collection". That would open up so many possibilities. It should work with public services as well as those requiring authentication (a user's Google Facebook MailChimp etc. account).
